title: The ONE Group provides privacy notice for 13 states
statement: The ONE Group provides supplemental privacy information for residents of California, Colorado, Connecticut, Delaware, Iowa, Montana, Nebraska, New Hampshire, New Jersey, Oregon, Texas, Virginia, and Utah.

citations.quote: This Supplemental Notice provides residents of California, Colorado, Connecticut, Delaware, Iowa, Montana, Nebraska, New Hampshire, New Jersey, Oregon, Texas, Virginia, and Utah additional information
